charaepi_ch0285_41_kai/2301_1101_0100_20:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] spotted
Irida and Typhlosion doing some intense
training.
charaepi_ch0285_41_kai/2301_1201_0200_10:
Oh? [Name:PlayerNickname ], are
you here to train, too?
charaepi_ch0285_41_kai/2301_1201_0300_10:
Terastallizing... It’s a new kind of
power for us.
charaepi_ch0285_41_kai/2301_1201_0400_10:
But if we use it well, I think it’ll give us
more ways to battle!
charaepi_ch0285_41_kai/2301_1201_0500_10:
Hm? Oh, curious what Typhlosion’s
looking at?
charaepi_ch0285_41_kai/2301_1201_0600_10:
They say Hisuian Typhlosion can see
things people can’t!
charaepi_ch0285_41_kai/2301_0401_0800_10:
I hear they can see things like life
energy—and spirits!
charaepi_ch0285_41_kai/2301_0402_1000_10:
Yup. Apparently, they can see things like
spirits and life energy.
charaepi_ch0285_41_kai/2301_1201_1100_10:
That’s why in Hisui, people believe they
purify lost, forsaken souls with their
flames and guide them to the afterlife.
charaepi_ch0285_41_kai/2301_1201_1200_10:
Maybe they can see the strange bonds
that bring people and Pokémon together.
charaepi_ch0285_41_kai/2301_1201_1300_10:
I like to think that’s how I met
Typhlosion, anyway. We met on Pasio
in a space-time distortion.
charaepi_ch0285_41_kai/2301_1201_1400_10:
Meeting each other in this vast space...
It must be fate!
charaepi_ch0285_41_kai/2301_1201_1500_10:
I’ve always thought I should treasure
each encounter...and I’m sure I’ll keep
thinking that way.
charaepi_ch0285_41_kai/2301_1201_1600_10:
New power, new encounters...
It all makes me so happy!
charaepi_ch0285_41_kai/2301_0401_1800_10: If Typhlosion is happy, I’m happy.
charaepi_ch0285_41_kai/2301_0402_2000_10:
Yup! And I hope that’s how Typhlosion
sees me, too!
charaepi_ch0285_41_kai/2301_1201_2100_10:
I have to thank Typhlosion for showing
me more of this great wide world!
charaepi_ch0285_41_kai/2301_1201_2200_10: Thanks to her, my world’s even broader.
charaepi_ch0285_41_kai/2301_1201_2300_10:
The people on Pasio and the Terastal
phenomenon are so different from Hisui,
I never could’ve imagined them!
charaepi_ch0285_41_kai/2301_1201_2400_10: But no matter how vast the differences...
charaepi_ch0285_41_kai/2301_1201_2500_10:
I’m positive the bonds between people
and Pokémon can overcome them!
charaepi_ch0285_41_kai/2301_1201_2600_10:
Just like with me, Typhlosion, and you,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
